name: Le Golem Oublié
description:
Prototype developped for POT-AU-JEU, a gamejam by At0mium.

Concept: You have to collect old golems to create new things to find a mysterious person.

Controller:  the character is controled with the keyboard and the mouse.

Issues:

  • Music... what is it ?
  • Too much to list here...

Credits for assets:

  • Golem by hendi-sama
  • Foot step on grass by JanKoehl
  • Low sound by Uzbazur
  • Tinckling by Rach_Capache
  • Wind sound by Glaneur de sons

Thanks for Adrien for his suggestions!

Have a good game.
